property.name: membertype
property.label: Member Type
property.description: Use this attribute to indicate the entity being modified/created. Eg : Debtor, Secured Party, Assignor, etc.

property.name: newUCCId
property.label: newUCCId
property.description: Use this attribute to pass UCC Filing record ID.This will be used to associate all entities created. Eg : Debtor, Secured Party, Assignor, etc.
